jProtocol.tls12.model.fragments

Interface TlsFragment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TlsAeadFragment, TlsBlockFragment, TlsStreamFragment

    public interface TlsFragment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getBytes()
      Returns the bytes which will be sent in the fragment (including the encrypted part and optional unencrypted data like IVs).
      byte[] getContent()
      Returns the unencrypted content of the fragment.
      java.lang.String getFragmentName()
      Should return the fragment name for displaying purposes.
      int getLength()
      Returns the length of the fragment which will be sent.
      KeyValueObject getViewData(TlsMessage message)
      Should return the view data (key value object) for the fragment and included message.

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Returns the length of the fragment which will be sent.
        Returns:
        the fragment length

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
        Returns the bytes which will be sent in the fragment (including the encrypted part and optional unencrypted data like IVs).
        Returns:
        the bytes to be sent

      • getContent

        byte[] getContent()
        Returns the unencrypted content of the fragment.
        Returns:
        the unencrypted content

      • getViewData

        KeyValueObject getViewData(TlsMessage message)
        Should return the view data (key value object) for the fragment and included message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message view data should also be included for
        Returns:
        the view data

      • getFragmentName

        java.lang.String getFragmentName()
        Should return the fragment name for displaying purposes.
        Returns:
        the fragment name
